name: Pitch Black: A Detectives Demise
description:
Pitch Black: A Detectives Demise is a Noir Detective game set in the future of Dusklight using only binaural audio.

Dive into the world of future Dusklight with this audio-only adventure. Take on the role of the detective as you comb the dark street's of district 5 to uncover the dark workings of a mysterious plot...

This game features unique never before seen audio mechanics created by Purple Jam.
